title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 2, pt. 80 - Introduction And Definitions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 2, pt. 80

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 472[1], 475, 1142[1], 1250; art. 20-A; L. 2002, chs. 1, 93; L. 2008, ch. 57, part RR-1; L. 2010, ch. 134, part D
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
